label: What is the classification of your data?
helpTip: This refers to the sensitivity and risk level of the data you are working with.

label: How often is the data expected to be accessed/modified?
helpTip: This helps determine the performance and availability requirements.

label: With whom do you need to regularly share your data?
helpTip: This determines the access control and collaboration needs.

options.text: No one - Only I need access

label: How much data do you have, and how fast do you expect it to grow?
helpTip: This helps assess storage capacity and scalability needs.

options.text: I have a small amount of data (<100GB), and it is unlikely to grow much in the next 2 years.
I have a small amount of data (<100GB), but it is likely to grow exponentially in the next 2 years.
I have a large amount of data (>100GB), but it is unlikely to grow significantly in the next 2 years
I have a large amount of data (>100GB), and it is likely to grow exponentially in the next 2 years

label: How are you expecting to access the data?
helpTip: This determines the network and security requirements.

options.text: I need easy access to this data from anywhere in the world, without VPN
I need access to this data when in the office, or on the VPN
